group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*
Scusi?

group_1.textRight: How could you NOT hear me?!
I'm only 3 feet away from you!
You heard me!
[chara:800700:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Don't you "scusi" me!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry.
Your words reached my ears, but apparently@failed to reach my mind.

group_1.textRight: I swear...
All right, I'll ask you one more time.
Are you planning to submit anything to the@next International High School Art Exhibit?
[chara:800700:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Ignoring me again...

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it obvious from my behavior?
Come hell or high water, the answer is still@no.

group_1.textRight: Mmmngh...
But it's an exhibition where students all@over the world can showcase their work.
It's a chance for you to have your artwork @seen by countless people.
What's more, I bet there are people out@there dying to see more of your work.
At that one exhibit recently...
You showed off "Ode to the Psychedelic@Youth" and got rave reviews, right?

group_1.textLeft: (That exhibit was put on entirely at the@whim of that art museum...)
*Sigh*
Even so, I still don't wish to take part.
Anyway, you.
Don't pretend like you're doing me a favor.@You just want to get your hands on my work.
As for that international art exhibition...
I don't know how involved with them you@are.
But I can tell when an adult is trying to@use my name for their own gain.
I'm not impressed. I would like you to get@out of my sight now.
Um...

group_1.textRight: You're right!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textRight: Alina, with your artwork, they can bet on@way more interest from visitors!

group_1.textLeft: Um...

group_1.textRight: I'm a social studies teacher, but for some@reason I'm responsible for the art club.
So I want to contribute somehow.

group_1.textLeft: He's not even trying to hide it anymore...

group_1.textRight: But it's also because I'm thinking about@what's best for you!
You need this kind of opportunity to get@recognition. It's the same for everyone.

group_1.textLeft: But I, Alina, am already famous.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800700:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]W-well, yes, but...

group_1.textLeft: Now leave!
Back to your little teacher nest, to grade@all of your history papers.

group_1.textRight: I knew there was no getting through to her.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sir! That's because nothing you try will@work today!

group_1.textRight: Karin...

group_1.textLeft: I'd really like to help you out...
But Alina is in a bad mood today.

group_1.textRight: So I've gathered.
Her fuse is about five times shorter today@than usual.

group_1.textLeft: So it's better you just go!
You can ask her again when she's in a better@mood, that way...

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh! My strawberry milk!
Awww...
Alina, you're so mean!

group_1.textLeft: (YOU'RE the reason my mood is so rotten,@Karin Misono!)

group_1.textRight: Y-you're scaring me...

group_1.narration: Yes, all of this is because@of that idiota's rambling...
